Class PaymentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.service.PaymentDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PaymentDAOI
    public class PaymentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements PaymentDAOI
    This is a DAO class to execute CRUD operations with objects of Payment class

    1.5.
    Author:

    See Also:
